name: Little Nemo and the Nightmare Fiends
summary: Little Nemo and the Nightmare Fiends is a 2D non-linear platformer with 4 playable characters that players can freely switch between. The game features artwork inspired by the groundbreaking 1905 Little Nemo in Slumberland comic, hand-drawn keyframed animation, and a cast of surreal creatures and characters.
